item.description:
Trip's Coordinator : Ben Felzer bfelzer@yahoo.com 508 540 4298 (h) 508 289 7748 (w)

EVENT: Join us on this (final) annual fun day on the Cape. Last year we had about 25 people, so don?t miss out! We will walk 4 miles through the woods and glacial landscape around beautiful Long Pond, spend the afternoon on Old Silver Beach, and end the day with a barbeque back at my house. Please bring lunch and drink for the hike/beach, and side dish for the barbeque. Plan to stay late (and possible sleep over) and enjoy each other?s company with some karaoke!

RSVP: Required by Thursday, July 17
MEET: 10am in Falmouth, contact TC for exact location and directions
COST: $5 non-members

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: HIKE, BEACH & BARBEQUE ON THE CAPE
